price: 27. Allah nous a donc fait grâce en nous épargnant le tourment de As-Samûm.[526]
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
